changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.agency_location_access_authorization AS SELECT a.id, rsc.name AS agency, ptr.name AS agency_relationship, r.name AS relationship, l.name AS location, ctr.name AS location_relationship FROM access_authorization a JOIN agency rsc ON a.agency1 = rsc.id JOIN relationship ptr ON a.parent_transitive_relationship = ptr.id JOIN relationship r ON a.relationship = r.id JOIN location l ON a.location2 = l.id JOIN relationship ctr ON a.child_transitive_relationship = ctr.id WHERE a.authorization_type = '1';
ALTER TABLE readable.agency_location_access_authorization OWNER TO core;
